title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Trump signs historic peace deal between Israel, UAE, Bahrain, used different approach and it worked. Trump greets Netanyahu at front door of White House. Biden petrified of catching coronavirus. Kamala Harris says "the Harris Administration". The contrast between Little League Biden in the wheat field and Trump hosting grand peace deal signing at the White House. Events that will impact election still haven't happened yet. Carolina Panthers fire Spanish-language broadcaster for tweeting support for Trump. Long story on how Biden and Biden campaign are paranoid about him catching COVID-19. Somebody wanted that story out there. Many older and vulnerable people are afraid of catching the virus, but Biden does not seem up to the presidency; comparison with Trump is stark. Did Harris intentionally reference the "Harris administration" to send a signal that he's a Trojan horse. Caller suggests Biden will try to do virtual debates from basement.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Trump achieves peace deal in Middle East that all presidents since the 1950s have chased, media not paying enough attention, and Trump did it in an entirely different way, sidelining Palestinians. Trump and the Palestinians, Trump presents key to White House to Netanyahu. Rush never believed negotiated Middle East peace was possible without one side winning a war, but Trump's approach is working. Peace breaks out everywhere but Democrat cities. LA County sheriff challenges LeBron James to match reward for ambushed deputies. Heroism of female deputy who was shot in face, still saved herself and partner. Bystanders didn't help wounded deputies, cheered instead. Democrats are convinced they will win and they will riot if they lose, but it will be worse if they win. If Biden wins, it's the end of democracy, GOP. They will grant statehood to DC, Puerto Rico, pack the court and establish one-party government. Trump surging with Hispanics, Biden greeted by supporters in Tampa -- Trump supporters.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The most enthusiastic voter in America is the Donald Trump voter. Media has made you think Trump will lose in a landslide. Trump gaining in Florida, likely way ahead. Democrats have become the party of the elites. Trump's GOP is the party of the little guy. Trump leads in small donors. Former teacher thinks male college professors push liberalism, influence Millennials who lack father figures. Trump made these peace deals happen, it doesn't have to do with fear of Biden winning. Around the world, MAGA concept isn't controversial. If we lose this election, we'll have a one-party country.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
